PAGE_TITLES.HOME: CRNCY.com | The Multi Currency FX Settlement Coins

SLOGAN: The Multi Currency FX Settlement Coins

PROMO.MAIN_TEXT: Enabling same day "t0" settlement of FX trades with our G12 interest-bearing settlement coins

TITLES.TITLE_1: Easily convert G12 currencies into tokens and

CARDS.TEXT_1: Real-time independant attestation of Reserves from a top 5 Auditor
CARDS.TEXT_2: Tokens apreciate following daily money market rates
CARDS.TEXT_3: Unique ISAC & ISA bankruptcy remote corporate structure
CARDS.TEXT_4: 5sec. transfer finality, lowest cost and full transparency
CARDS.TEXT_5: Reserves 100% in Fiat, not even goverment securities
CARDS.TEXT_6: CRNCY.com members have access to interbank quality FX-t0 pricing

CARDS.TEXT_1: Nominal value of each Settlement Coin will be adjusted daily at 5pm NY to reflect the accrual of the daily money market interests.
CARDS.TEXT_2: Franck is a serial innovator and entrepreneur who moved from a Futures background in France and Italy and embraced the global FX markets.
CARDS.TEXT_3: Active traders can capture price discrepancies between any markets in different countries. With CRNCY FX-t0, a triangular Arbitrage can be settled same-day in Tokens between any of the G12 currencies.
CARDS.TEXT_4: CRNCY enables Fund Managers or Family Offices of any size to custody their funds with the highest-tier Custodian Bank without the need for complex and expensive direct onboarding
CARDS.TEXT_5: CRNCY Tokens are as efficient as Fiat and a superior mobile form of collateral that can be pledged or moved intra-day multiple times. These Settlement Coins can be used for all sorts of trading activities on any asset class.

TECHNOLOGY.TITLE_1: The issuing of Settlement Coins is performed by CRNCY under its
TECHNOLOGY.TITLE_3: , ar ranging a sale of tokens versus payment of fiat
TECHNOLOGY.TEXT_1: This separation ensures that the Settlement Coins reserves (ISAs) are immune from risks of CRNCY failures (the ISAC operating company). In the event that CRNCY had to be wound down, the Bermudean courts have the obligation to return funds to all registered Token holders.
TECHNOLOGY.TEXT_2: The issuing of Settlement Coins is performed by CRNCY under its DAB licence, arranging a sale of Tokens versus payment of Fiat. Redeeming is the reverse process when CRNCY arranges to purchase 1:1 the Tokens back from a registered user as agreed in the terms of the CRNCY Settlement Coins agreement.
TECHNOLOGY.TEXT_3: ISAs are legally segregated and bankruptcy remote single purpose entities that CRNCY set specifically for the custody of Settlement Coins Fiat reserves. Each ISA utilises one (1) disclosed custodian bank, and remains bankruptcy remote from all other ISAs and the CRNCY ISAC itself.

FAQ.TITLE: FAQ
FAQ.TEXT: Find answers to common questions about our platform and services. Get the information you need.

ITEMS.TEXT_1: Yes, your funds are safe with CRNCY.com. Your funds are held in custody by only the most trusted tier 1 custodian banks with a small portion held at rails banks for liquidity purposes.
ITEMS.TITLE_2: What stops the token from de-pegging?
ITEMS.TEXT_2: All issued tokens are backed by FIAT held within a bankruptcy remote structure at a tier 1 bank(s) and are audited in real time. Members can redeem the tokens at the daily published price which provides the primary value underpin.
ITEMS.TITLE_3: How often does interest get paid?
ITEMS.TEXT_3: Interest is not paid, but added to the redemption value at the end of every business day (17:00 EST).
ITEMS.TEXT_4: Our custodian bank sweeps the interest earned on the overnight money market daily to our account. CRNCY.com then adjusts the token redemption value - the value at which we issue and redeem tokens - to capitalise the interest earned (net of a small haircut to cover operating costs).
ITEMS.TITLE_5: How does CRNCY.com differ from other stable coin platforms?
ITEMS.TEXT_5: CRNCY.com is different from other stablecoin issuers as all of our tokens accrue interest, we also offer interbank FX capabilities with same day settlement in coins.
ITEMS.TITLE_6: What happens if CRNCY.com goes out of business?
ITEMS.TEXT_6: In the event of CRNCY.com's closure, your assets would be returned, following a formal and secure process. The assets are held in a bankruptcy remote structure which means that the assets are not impacted by the CRNCY.com going out of business.
ITEMS.TEXT_7: Yes, CRNCY.com is licensed to issue and redeem digital asset settlement coins.. We're committed to maintaining full compliance with all applicable regulations to ensure the highest level of trust and security. Both CRNCY and the related bankruptcy remote vehicle(s) that hold the fiat assets are regulated by the Bermuda Monetary Authority as digital asset businesses.
ITEMS.TEXT_8: CRNCY.com plans to support the G12 currencies with future plans to support all of the G20 currencies.
ITEMS.TITLE_9: Why does CRNCY.com need my personal information?
ITEMS.TEXT_9: As a regulated platform, CRNCY.com is required to collect personal information to comply with KYC (Know Your Customer) and AML (Anti-Money Laundering) and Anti-terror Financing regulations. This also helps us protect our users and maintain a secure platform.

PRIVACY.TITLE: Privacy & Cookie Policy
PRIVACY.TEXT_1: This website has been provided by CRNCY Ltd. as a general public information. The details given are taking into account present European legislation and standards.
PRIVACY.TEXT_2: If not otherwise specifically stated on this website, all rights reserved CRNCY Ltd. Names of companies and products identified on the website may be the trademarks of their owners respectively, of which CRNCY Ltd. does not claim any rights.
PRIVACY.TEXT_3: CRNCY Ltd. reserves the right to amend and supplement the website at any time and without prior notice.
PRIVACY.TEXT_4: The information of the website is given in good faith but without warranty. All liability for damages of whatever nature that might arise from the use or existence of the website and its information is explicitly excluded to the extent permitted by applicable law.
PRIVACY.SUBTITLE_4: Information on the use of cookies
PRIVACY.TEXT_5: Cookies are small text files that contain technical information to facilitate the use of a website. When you visit the site these cookies are added onto your browser. We use two types of cookies:
PRIVACY.TEXT_6: Cookies that keeps track of visitor during the time the visit lasts, e.g. to publish pages in the correct language. These cookies' function cease when the surf's up, which means that nothing is stored. In the browser's list of cookies set out the normal as JSESSIONID.
PRIVACY.SUBTITLE_6: Cookies that are stored on your computer
PRIVACY.TEXT_7: This type of cookie is used for statistical tracking and contains information that makes it possible to identify returning visitors, either through the visitor's IP address, or by a unique number. It also makes it possible to evaluate visitors' activities on the site, in order to improve navigation and content. CRNCY Ltd. does not store personally identifiable information about the visitor. However, because we use Google Analytics and other similar services for statistical purposes, data is forwarded to these companies' servers in order to compile statistical data on pages visited, language, country, search terms, operating systems, browsers, etc. In the browser's list of cookies this type of cookies have names as _utma , _utmz , _ga , gs_u_GSN -xxx- J.
PRIVACY.TEXT_8: The cookies used on CRNCY's website have no functions other than those described above. But if you do not accept the use of cookies when visiting the website you can turn off CRNCY cookies in your browser's security settings. There you can also delete previously stored CRNCY cookies.

We may use cookies to collect, store, and track information for statistical or marketing purposes to operate our website. You have the ability to accept or decline optional Cookies.
